app.name: Helpclub
app.tagline: Nordic care with a clear path forward
app.metaDescription: Helpclub brings programs, community, and support together for teams building stronger local networks across the Nordics.

home.heroTitle: A Nordic home for care and opportunity
home.heroBody: Helpclub connects people, advisors, and local resources across the region. Build rhythm, track goals, and share progress in a trusted space.
home.spotlightBody: Safe start: gather needs, match mentors, and align next steps with the local team.

care.title: Care teams
care.body: Coordinate contacts and share assignments in real time.

skills.title: Skill pathways
skills.body: Track training, certifications, and next steps.

partnerships.title: Partnerships
partnerships.body: Keep local collaborations aligned in one view.

programs.title: Program overview
programs.subtitle: Modules for onboarding, wellbeing, and community building.

mentorship.title: Mentorship
mentorship.body: Match participants with guides, schedule sessions, and track goals.

language.title: Language & daily life
language.body: Support language practice, civic knowledge, and local routines.

wellbeing.title: Wellbeing
wellbeing.body: Build safety with structured check-ins and resources.

career.title: Work readiness
career.body: Plan internships, CV sessions, and employer connections.

community.title: Community
community.subtitle: Grow relationships through local activities and open forums.

circle.title: Local discussion circles
circle.body: Weekly gatherings focused on safety and participation.

makers.title: Makerspace
makers.body: Build together and share hands-on skills.

outdoor.title: Outdoor day
outdoor.body: Group hike with fika and reflection.

chat.title: Care coordination chat
chat.subtitle: Live rooms for triage, onboarding, and partner alignment.
chat.presence: 6 people online, response time under 2 min.
chat.composerPlaceholder: Write an update, ask for coverage, or tag someone...

care.name: Care triage
care.topic: Escalations and next steps for today's cases.

onboarding.name: Onboarding flow
onboarding.topic: Warm handoffs, checklists, and first-week tasks.

focus.title: Shift focus
focus.one: Confirm escalation coverage for the afternoon shift.
focus.two: Send onboarding checklist to municipal leads.
focus.three: Capture two success stories for the weekly report.

care.one: We have two new referrals from Umea. Can we confirm transport?
care.two: I can take the transport call. Any medical notes I should flag?
care.three: Yes, asthma note in profile and needs Swedish interpreter.

onboarding.one: New cohort starts Monday. Do we have the welcome kit ready?
onboarding.two: I will finalize the kit today and send the checklist.
onboarding.three: Great. I'll brief the mentors at 14:00.

partners.one: Gothenburg team asked for a joint session next week.
partners.two: Let's offer Wednesday morning and share the agenda.
partners.three: I will confirm the slot and update the shared calendar.

quickReplies.schedule: Can we align on the schedule?

autoReplies.care: I can loop in the nurse coordinator and draft the update.
autoReplies.onboarding: On it. I'll post the final checklist in 15 minutes.
autoReplies.partners: I will notify the municipality and confirm the call time.

errors.requestFailed: Couldn't reach the Helpclub AI assistant. Try again.
errors.emptyReply: The Helpclub AI assistant did not return a reply.

support.title: Support center
support.subtitle: Resources and contact paths for safe delivery.

care.title: Crisis support
care.body: Rapid escalation, hotline numbers, and guidance.

legal.title: Rights
legal.body: Unified guidance on regulations and local policies.

funding.title: Funding
funding.body: Overview of local grants, stipends, and aid.

contact.title: Contact
contact.body: Message the team or schedule a follow-up.

impact.title: Impact
impact.subtitle: Tracking safety, participation, and long-term outcomes.

engagement.title: Engagement
engagement.body: Share of participants meeting weekly goals.

profile.title: Profile
profile.subtitle: A single view of your role, tasks, and goals.

nextSteps.title: Next steps
nextSteps.one: Confirm mentorship matches for new participants.
nextSteps.three: Follow up on the wellbeing pulse survey.

footer.title: Building safer communities
footer.body: Helpclub supports local teams across the Nordics with planning, coordination, and follow-up.
